name: Magnes
description:
The last surviving humans from the AI epidemic were killed in an atomic blast. Those who weren't in direct vicinity died due to the radiation. But somehow you survived.

You play as, Magnes. The first lineage of genetically and technologically modified human being. You are severely damaged, however your main source of power and life, your internal magnet, is keeping you alive.

Survive the epidemic by absorbing red junk that powers your magnet and repairs you, while blasting your enemies to smithereens.

Created in a week by Nikhil Jolly for WeeklyGameJam 19.
